Sweet Wine Trio
class2.Description:
This trio showcases wines that are refreshing, yet slightly sweet, appealing to those who enjoy their wine on the sweeter side. With a bottle each from California, South Africa and Washington State, these wines deliver a variety of styles.

Wine Set Includes:
  • Allure Bubbly Pink Moscato
    Bright pink color indicates the wine will be very festive in nature. Apricot, peach, bergamot, and mint flavors give the Pink Moscato a fresh and lively demeanor. The combination of bubbles and off-dry balance enhance the refreshment enjoyed with each sip.
  • Jam Jar Sweet White
    Jam Jar was born out of the realization that there are not a lot of options available to consumers seeking quality sweet wine. This charming, easy-drinking Moscato from South Africa offers flavors of peach, apricot, lychee and orange blossom. Lightly sweet with crisp acidity to keep it fresh, this wine is quite versatile. Served as an aperitif, with a spicy meal like Thai food, or with a fruity dessert, this wine is sure to be enjoyed on any occasion.
  • Pacific Oasis Riesling
    Originally made famous in the cooler climate of Germany, Riesling truly has found a home in Washington state. Sweet Rieslings in particular are a popular style for many wine lovers. In this Riesling, there are flavors of apricot, green apple, honey and lemon with hints of floral aromas. This wine has complex flavors that marry with a semi-sweet finish that can be enjoyed with food or by itselfli>
  • Printed Insert that describes the featured wines

Due to the popularity of this gift, vintages sometimes sell out. Should this happen, we will always substitute with the current vintage.

Downton Abbey Duo (Claret & Blanc)
class2.Description:
When Mr. Carson pulled a bottle of wine from the cellar for Lord and Lady Grantham, one could be assured it was a fine French Bordeaux, the wine of choice amongst the British nobility in Edwardian England.Honouring those same wine-making traditions, the Downton Abbey Wine collection is crafted with premium fruit from the famed Entre-Deux-Mers region of Bordeaux, France by Dulong Grand Vins, a family-owned vineyard with more than 130 years of winemaking experience.

This Duo contains one each:
Downton Abbey Claret
This classic Bordeaux red blend or "Claret" is an elegant, dry wine made with grapes from the renowned Entre-Deux-Mers ("between two seas") region of Bordeaux, France. Here, sun-drenched vineyards on well-draining limestone and clay soils are situated between the Garonne and Dordogne Rivers. Warm days and cool evenings provide optimal growing conditions for the slow ripening of grapes and excellent flavour development.

Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon and Malbec -- three of the classic grape varieties of Bordeaux â€“ were blended together in crafting this wine. Fruit was sourced from premium vineyards in the eastern part of Entre-Deux-Mers, a terroir particularly well-suited to these varietals. The wine was made using traditional vinification practices: Each varietal was vinified separately including temperature-controlled macerations of 4-5 weeks for maximum extraction of flavour and colour. The wines were then aged an additional nine months prior to final blending.

Deep purple in colour, this wine reveals gorgeous scents of wild berries including blackberries, raspberries and black currants in the glass. Additional spicy notes and hints of violet are contributed by the Malbec. On the round, well-balanced palate, more ripe fruit flavours merge seamlessly with velvety tannins from the Merlot. Cabernet Sauvignon in the blend gives added freshness, backbone and age-worthiness to this authentic Bordeaux bottling.

An excellent food wine, enjoy this Bordeaux Claret with chesses, game, grilled red meats, hearty stews and more.

Blend: 70% Merlot, 25% Cabernet Sauvignon, 5% Malbec

Downton Abbey Blanc
This classic Bordeaux white wine is an elegant, dry version made with grapes sourced from the famed Entre-Deux-Mers ("between two seas") region of Bordeaux, France. Here, sun-drenched vineyards on well-draining limestone and clay soils are situated between the Garonne and Dordogne Rivers, creating ideal grape growing conditions featuring warm days tempered by the cool evenings.

A blend of Muscadelle and Semillion fruit from the northern part of the region was used in crafting this wine. Grapes were harvested at the perfect moment of ripeness for maximum aromas and flavours. Ferments took place in temperature-controlled stainless steel tanks to harness even more bright fruit characters and freshness. Following fermentation, the juice underwent maturation on fine lees to add richness and complexity to the final blend.

In the glass, this wine is a lovely pale yellow in colour. On the expressive nose, classic notes of tangerine lead to more citrusy notes and delicious flavours of apricots on a harmonious, crisp palate. The wine is perfectly balanced offering roundness on the palate, complimented by a refreshing, lingering finish.

Enjoy this wine as delicious accompaniment to goat cheese, fish, shellfish and more, or as a refreshing aperitif all on its own.

Blend: 70% Muscadelle, 30% Semillon Blanc.

The Wine Aroma Wheel
class2.Description:
Did you know that as much as 80 percent of what we perceive as "taste" is actually smell? Novice wine tasters often find it difficult to translate into words the things they smell in a wine. Fortunately, it is very easy to train our noses and brains to connect and quickly link terms with aromas.

The UC Davis Wine Aroma Wheel, developed by A.C. Noble, is made of three tiers: it has very general terms located in the center (e.g. fruity or chemical), going to the most specific terms in the outer tier (e.g. grapefruit or strawberries). It's an extremely useful tool to learn about wines and enhance one's ability to describe the complexity of wine flavor.

Italian 6-Pack of Savings
class3.Description:
This six-bottle set boasts some serious press for some seriously great wine. You won't find this deal anywhere else!

Includes:
  • Tenuta di Nozzole 2013 Chianti Classico Riserva - 93 points Antonio Galloni, Vinous
    "The 2013 Chianti Classico Riserva is absolutely delicious. Ample and broad on the palate, the 2013 offers striking depth and texture throughout. Dark red cherry, plum, smoke, licorice, menthol and cloves give the 2013 its dark, enveloping personality. Drink this virile, brooding Riserva over the next handful of years."
  • Antinori 2013 Chianti Classico Peppoli - 92 points James Suckling
    "Some dried fruit with strawberry and lemon rind on the nose and palate. Medium to full body. Tangy tannins. PÃ¨ppoli is always excellent."
  • Antinori 2014 Guado al Tasso Il Bruciato - 90 points Wilfred Wong of Wine.com
    "An admirable example of a New World blend from an Old World producer. The 2014 Antinori Guado al Tasso Il Bruciato does a first-rate job of combining Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot-with a little bit of Syrah. This wine exhibits dark fruits, black tea, and savory spices. Its firm palate pairs it nicely with roasted rack of lamb."
  • Bisol 2015 Crede Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore - 92 points James Suckling
    "A fresh and bright sparkling wine with lemons and sliced green apples. Medium body and a lovely beaded texture from the bubbles. Creamy. Fresh finish."
  • Terlato Family Vineyards Friuli Pinot Grigio 2015 - 93 points Tasting Panel
    "No doubt this prestigious region in northeast Italy shines when it comes to white wines; an envious position on the world wine stage. This pretty, crisp white certainly shows ripeness in its concentrated notes of pear, peach and grapefruit but its stoney frame is a nod to the iconic mineral rich sloped terraced vineyards responsible for its pizazz and charm. The finish is clean, punctuated with an apricot accent."
  • Santa Cristina by Antinori Rosso 2014
    Ruby red in color with purple highlights, the wine shows an intense and complex nose of ripe red fruit as well as balsamic and eucalyptus and mint. Full and supple on the palate, it is a wine with a complex and fruity finish and lingering aftertaste.

class3.Name: 90+ Point Red Wine Trio
class3.Description:
This collection includes three of our favorite 90+ point rated red wines from across the globe. From California to Spain and Italy, taste your way through three stunning examples of highly-rated red wines from their respective regions.

Wine Gift Set Includes:

  • Reata 2013 Three County Pinot Noir
    This Pinot Noir is notable for its rich ruby color and notes of cherry, raspberry and pomegranate. Aromas of vanilla fill the glass that lead to a well-structured weight on the palate. French oak notes lead to a strong finish that lingers on the palate nicely. A great Pinot Noir for any occasion.
    Rated 90 Points: Tasting Panel Magazine
    Rated 90 Points: Wilfred Wong, Wine.com

  • CVNE 2012 Vina Real Crianza
    This wine shows shades of medium to deep shiny cherry colour on a purple background. To the nose, intense aromas of ripe fruits stand out, complemented with subtle hints of oak. To the palate, it shows structured and round with a good integration of fruitiness and oakiness. The aftertaste is marked by very well balanced tannins as well as by persistent spicy, toasty and balsamic aromas.
    Rated 92 Points:Robert Parker's, The Wine Advocate

  • Borgo Scopeto 2013 Chianti Classico
    Deep ruby red, with light burgundy reflections, this full and intense wine has notes of small wild berries and pleasing scents of noble wood, vanilla and cocoa. Dry, well structured, austere and elegant, this Chianti strikes a harmonious balance between structure and fruit, and boasts an excellent persistence on the palate.
    Rated 91 Points: James Suckling
    Rated 90 Points: Wine Spectator Magazine

    Due to the popularity of this gift, wines sometimes sell out. Should this happen, we will always substitute with wines of equal or greater value.

class3.Description:
We filled this basket to the brim with an unparalleled selection of four delicious wines sure to impress the discerning palate: Mumm Napa Brut Prestige, Landmark Chardonnay, DAOU Cabernet Sauvignon, and Seghesio Sonoma Zinfandel. To this we added a collection of superb goodies and tied it up with a festive bow.

Wine Gift Basket Includes:

  • Mumm Napa Brut Prestige:
    A complex assemblage of primarily Pinot Noir and Chardonnay, Brut Prestige opens with gorgeous layered white blossom aromas, followed by creamy vanilla, citrus, stone fruit and melon. With elegant acidity and crisp structure, this medium-bodied sparkling wine displays an excellent mousse and a rich, lingering finish.

  • Landmark Chardonnay:
    This Chardonnay has a bright, medium gold color with complex aromas of ripe pear,meyer lemon, sage and lemon curd. On the palate flavors of quince, pear blossom, apricot, and piecrust are balanced by lively citrus notes completing this refreshing wine.

  • DAOU Cabernet Sauvignon:
    Rich deep dark berry color with creamy mocha-espresso flavors is the first impression of this wine. The tannins are well integrated with the fruit and create a long finish that keeps going.

  • Seghesio Sonoma Zinfandel:
    This Zinfandel produces spicy, lush black fruit flavors characteristic of Alexander Valley. Briary raspberry, with plenty of structure. Overall, this is a very well-balanced and elegant Zinfandel to match a wide variety of foods.

class3.Name: 90+ Point Cabernet Trio
class3.Description:
This collection includes three of our favorite 90+ point rated Cabernet Sauvignon wines from around the globe. The trio offers top-notch Cabs from Washington State, Australia and Chile. It's a great way for any Cabernet lover to taste a variety of stunning examples of this classic varietal.

Wine Gift Set Includes:

  • Seven Falls 2013 Wahluke Slope Cabernet Sauvignon
    Ripe black cherry and boysenberry fruit flavors are layered with notes of caramel, mocha and black tea. This concentrated, full bodied wine has a smooth lasting finish.An elegant, complex wine with a deep ruby red color. The nose shows aromas of red fruits with light notes of chocolate and orange rind. The mouthfeel is full and well structured, with sweet spice and vanilla notes from French oak aging, and soft, finely grained tannins with excellent length.
    Rated 90 Points: Wine Enthusiast Magazine

  • Jim Barry Cover Drive Cabernet Sauvignon (2013 or 2014 vintage)

    Deep garnet in color with high clarity. The nose is very aromatic, displaying characters of cassis, cedar, black currant and hints of dried herbs. The palate is medium bodied and generous, showing fine tannins, highlighted by flavors of boysenberry, menthol and morello cherries.
    2014 Rated 91 Points: Wine & Spirits Magazine
    2013 Rated 90 Points Robert Parker's, The Wine Advocate

  • Concha y Toro 2014 Marques de Casa Concha Cabernet Sauvignon

    Marques de Casa Concha, is dark ruby red in color with luscious aromas of cherry and blackberries intertwined with cedar and smoke. These notes follow through to the palate. Tremendously concentrated flavors are revealed in firm tannins with a soft, silky texture and a lingering finish.
    Rated 92 Points: James Suckling

The estate's Bordeaux varietals benefit from the Yountville microclimate where temperatures are moderated by cool breezes from the San Pablo Bay. The resulting wines are each uniquely refined expressions of this special terroir.

Blend: 86% Cabernet Sauvignon, 9% Petit Verdot, 5% Cabernet Franc
Original Wooden Case (OWC) may ship in a separate box from the wine

Duckhorn Vineyards 90 Point Wine Trio
class3.Description:
This collection combines the three 90 Point wines from the renowned Duckhorn Wine Company: Goldeneye, seductive Pinot Noir hailing from the cool-climate Anderson Valley; Cabernet Sauvignon from Duckhorn Vineyards, known for its excellent Bordeaux varietals in Napa Valley; and Paraduxx Proprietary Red Blend, a smooth and lush Zinfandel, Cabernet Sauvignon, and Merlot blend.

Wine Set Includes:
  • 2013 Anderson Valley Pinot Noir
    As a part of the Duckhorn family, Goldeneye winery is dedicated to the production of world class Pinot Noir from the Anderson Valley. This wine explodes on the palate with flavors of bright cherry, blackberry, wildflowers and pomegranate, as well as more savory layers of earth and leather. Silky tannins underscore this wineâ€™s exceptional structure and texture, while leading to a long, lush finish with a touch of redwood.

    91 Points Vinous- "This is a serious appellation-level Pinot with real depth and tons of personality."

  • 2012 or 2013 Duckhorn Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon
    Blended to showcase the rich diversity of great Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon, this wine is crafted from grapes sourced from acclaimed Napa appellations as well as a mix of mountain and valley floor fruit. Aromas of ripe currant, spearmint, marzipan and tobacco lead to intense flavors of blackberry and black cherry, all supported by a subtle framework of French oak, which adds nuance, depth and dimension to the finish.

    91 Points James Suckling - "Delicate and balanced with blueberry, currant and light stone character. Full to medium body, firm tannins and a fresh finish. Drink or hold."

  • 2012 or 2013 Paraduxx Proprietary Red Blend
    Paraduxx winery, a member of the larger Duckhorn family, has earned acclaim as the only winery solely devoted to stylish Napa Valley blends. Paraduxx winery's Proprietary Red Blend offers a heady mix of blueberry and cherry aromas, underscored by layers of vanilla, clove, molasses, black pepper and lavender. On the palate, it is velvety and round with berry and cherry flavors supported by well-integrated tannins. Balanced acidity adds brightness and lift of brambly fruit, which carries through to a long, satisfying finish.

    90 Points James Suckling- "A soft and fruity red with blackberry, blueberry character and hints of bitter orange. Full body, firm tannins and fresh finish."
    91 Points Wine Review Online     2013 vintage.

class3.Description:
You may not be in California this holiday, but you can certainly dream about it! California Dreaming Big delivers six top varieties from the renowned wine regions of California. You'll taste the diversity of the state with Monterey Chardonnay, Santa Barbara Pinot Noir, Mendocino Petite Sirah, Napa Valley Sauvignon Blanc, Lodi Zinfandel and Sonoma County Cabernet Sauvignon.

Wine Gift Collection Includes:

  • Clos la Chance Monterey Chardonnay
    A burst of tropical fruit on the nose leads to pineapple and banana with a hint of mango and coconut on a refreshing, tropical palate. The wine is aged exclusively in stainless steel (no oak), so the fruit really shines through, along with distinctively bright acidity.

  • Sea Glass Pinot Noir
    This Pinot Noir captures the best of Santa Barbara's unique terroir with a fresh, light-bodied profile that allows the grape's varietal characteristics to shine through. An inviting, delicate perfume emerges from the glass, while bright red cherry and strawberry flavors lightly dance upon the palate. Beautifully balanced with vibrant acidity.

  • Parducci Small Lot Blend Petite Sirah
    This Sirah is a Mendocino specialty, and Parducci was one of the first wineries to bottle this varietal. Dark ruby in color with aromas of cherry, blackberry, mint, and chocolate, this big red wine embodies spice, dark fruit flavors and supple tannins.

  • Rutherford Ranch Sauvignon Blanc
    This Napa Valley Sauvignon Blanc often delivers bright and vibrant aromas of mango, fig, and fresh honeydew. Fresh flavors of grapefruit, kiwi and Meyer lemon with crisp acidity and a clean finish.

  • LangeTwins Zinfandel
    Zinfandel grows well in the warm, sunny regions of California where it produces wines with big fruit and spice. This fabulous Zinfandel delivers loads of fresh, vibrant blackberries and notes of spice, all balanced by a touch of vanilla oak and soft tannins.

  • Kenwood Sonoma County Cabernet Sauvignon
    Sourced from vineyards located in Sonoma, Dry Creek, and Alexander Valley, this beautiful Cabernet offers up ripe, dark fruit aromas and full-bodied flavors, which give way to a balanced, well-structured, and long finish.

class3.Description:
Three classic red varietals that represent the heart and soul of California wine: Pinot Noir, Zinfandel and Cabernet Sauvignon. This trio showcases the quintessential wines of the Golden State, ideal for any lover of California Red Wines.

Wine Gift Set Includes:

  • Sanford Pinot Noir
    This Pinot is deep red in color and is bursting with red and black fruits like raspberry and black cherry, along with savory notes of cola, white pepper and sage. The palate delivers rich berry flavors balanced nicely by bright acid and tannin structure. The wine was allowed to age in French oak barrels (partially new oak) for ten months, where it gained concentration and picked up hints of toast, anise and clove.

  • Kenwood Jack London Zinfandel
    There have been vineyards planted in the Jack London Vineyard since the 1860s, but Kenwood has made wine from this vineyard on Jack London's former hillside ranch since 1976. In this Zinfandel, fruity aromas of raspberry and fig combine with subtle notes of vanilla and white pepper. Delicate well-structured tannins provide an elegant mouth feel and a long finish.

  • Moniker Mendocino Cabernet Sauvignon

    Moniker Cabernet Sauvignon is an elegant wine showcasing three clones â€“ 4, 337 and 191 â€“ from Ukiah Valley's finest southwestern exposed sites. From maceration to fermentation, we worked to preserve the wine's tannic backbone: cold soaking the grapes for two days, pumping over the cap, and briefly leaving some of the lots on the skins for greater extraction. We chose a Languedoc yeast strain prized for delivering optimum fore-mouth volume while retaining varietally correct flavors, then blended in a touch of Petite Sirah for power and Cabernet Franc for a lacing of tobacco. French oak's unique propensity to gather complex flavors over time harmonizes with the secondary tones this Cabernet Sauvignon will develop with age.

class3.Description:
In the 17th Century, during the reign of Louis XIV, France enjoyed its most illustrious era. Louis XIV became known as the "Sun King" for his benevolence and his patronage of the Arts, which became the foundation of France's rich artistic heritage. At the Palace of Versailles Louis XIV was the first French King to drink Champagne.

Louis XIV's era became known as the Grand SiÃ¨cle - the "Great Century". Bottled in a replica of a 17th Century bottle evoking the radiance of that period, Laurent-Perrier's prestige cuvÃ©es embody luxury, magnificence and elegance fit for a king.

When it came to his prestige cuvÃ©e, Bernard de Nonancourt decided to highlight two of Champagne's traditional realms of proficiency: the blending of different crus and different vintages. Grand SiÃ¨cle is the epitome of Champagne cuvÃ©es, as it blends complementary wines from Laurent-Perrier's very best growths and most successful vintage years.

Grand SiÃ¨cle is made with a pinot noir and chardonnay blend, with the latter being slightly dominant. Twelve of the most prestigious villages supply these grapes; all of them classified at 100% Grands Crus such as Ambonnay, Verzenay, Mailly, Avize, Cramant, Chouilly and Le Mesnil-sur-Oger. Within the vineyards of these villages, only the very best plots are selected, as are the finest musts from the pressings. The blended wine is then aged during the second fermentation on the yeast for approximately five years.

It has a bright color, with a brilliant yellow hue. Its subtle aromas of honey, hazelnuts, grilled almonds and brioche, make this the perfect companion for refined dishes. It pairs just as well with poultry and truffles as it does with veal and morel mushrooms.

Just snap apart the 4 prefilled glasses to share among friends, or simply enjoy one glass at time. Finally, great wine made easy.

Versatile and oh so chic, Xo, G French Rose tastes as good as it looks. But don't let the color fool you. Hall & Walt VIP Napa & Sonoma Tasting Experience
class3.Description:
A VIP Napa & Sonoma Tasting Experience

*Includes 2-for-1 tasting passes to both HALL winery in St. Helena, Napa Valley and the WALT tasting room in downtown Sonoma*

This collection features two highly-rated wines from the Kathryn Hall family of wines: the HALL Cabernet Sauvignon, a Napa Valley classic from the outstanding 2013 vintage, lauded as the best in a generation; and - from sister winery WALT, named in honor of Kathryn’s parents - a single-vineyard Pinot Noir hailing from the illustrious Gap’s Crown site in the cool Sonoma Coast.

HALL Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2013 (92+ WA)

“HALL has quickly become one of the great superstars in the Napa Valley firmament.” Robert Parker – The Wine Advocate

This wine incorporates choice fruit from vineyards throughout Napa Valley, from HALL’s organic estate vineyards to small rugged hillside sites of their partner growers. By blending these various lots, winemaker Steve Leveque has created a wine with a dense garnet color, dark red fruit, wet stone, clove, cinnamon, and floral notes. The palate is dark and brooding with juicy briary fruit and well integrated oak, coming together in a finessed finish.

When visiting the stunning HALL winery in St. Helena, enjoy a flight of their highly praised wines in the unique tasting room with breathtaking views of the Mayacamas Mountains. Tour the state-of-the-art LEED Gold certified winemaking facility, the historic Bergfeld winery, and the Halls’ impressive modern art collection placed throughout the property.

WALT Gap’s Crown Vineyard Pinot Noir 2012 (93 PR) or 2013 (92 WE) or 2014
“Complex, silky Pinot with great layered flavors.” Pinot Report (on the 2012)

HALL’s partner winery, WALT is known for producing premier Pinot Noir and Chardonnay from distinctive vineyards located along the Pacific Coast. Gap’s Crown Vineyard sits in the heart of the Sonoma Coast Appellation on the edge of the Petaluma Gap, a band of lowlands along the Sonoma coastline inviting the Pacific Ocean’s cool, steady winds. Gentle slopes and rocky soils produce wines of great depth and richness. Brilliant garnet color, the wine has aromas of black mission fig, sassafras, bing cherry, and dried crushed violets. The palate reveals deep red fruit flavors of dark raspberry, baking spice, and beautifully integrated toasty oak. This is a dense and generous wine on the mid-palate, that has a robust yet elegant finish.

When visiting WALT’s tasting room in beautiful and historic downtown Sonoma, enjoy a flight of fine wines while relaxing in the charming garden. Experience ROOT 101, their premier Pinot Noir tasting, exploring over 1,000 miles of world class growing regions. WALT’s must-visit tasting room combines the warmth of a home with the inspiration of an art gallery.

Offering four chocolate bricks, each with a different cocoa content, BRIX chocolates are specifically blended to complement wine. The natural tannins in cocoa prime the palate for the tannins of the wine, allowing other flavors in the wine to shine. We carefully selected two wines to pair with a specific "brick" of chocolate.

Wine Gift Includes:
  • BRIX Chocolate Sampler:
    Includes four 4 ounce chocolate bricks (extra dark 70%, medium dark 60%, smooth dark 54%, and milk 46%.
  • Landmark Overlook Pinot Noir:
    Three of the California's most sought after coastal growing regions brilliantly meld together in this deeply flavored, stylish and truly balanced Pinot Noir.
  • Chateau Peymouton Bordeaux:
    This wine, dominated by red fruit (plum, cherry) a nuanced touch of nutmeg is medium bodied.

Wine gift sets & baskets may be packaged with the bottles separately boxed for their protection during shipment. Pursuant to state laws in New York, gifts that contain both food and wine will be sent in two separate packages.

The 2016 Ryder Cup tournament was held at the Hazeltine Golf Club in Minnesota, ending in a United States victory, its first crown since 2008, on Sunday, October 2. The eye-catching sketched label was designed by legendary golf course architect, Robert Trent Jones Jr.

Charles Heidsieck Brut Reserve Coffret with 2 Flutes
class3.Description:
This gift set includes the 93 Point Rated Charles Heidsieck Brut Reserve in a limited edition coffret with two champagne flutes.

About the Champagne
To the Eye
A deep golden robe. Delicate vivacious and long-lasting bubbles, are the result of more than 36 months of ageing in chalk cellars.

To the Nose
With 40% of reserve wines (the maximum possible amount), the blend offers a complex, voluptuous nose with notes of freshly baked brioche and the richness of roasted coffee beans. A precise selection of wines, purposely limited to 60 crus, ensures the Charles Heidsieck Brut Reserve a deliciously sophisticated harmony. An opulent selection of ripe, sun-drenched fruits such as mango, apricot and greengage plum combines with dried fruits, pistachio and almond.

On the Palate
The texture is reminiscent of a crisp layer of nougatine on a velvety cream pastry filled with plump red plums and ripe cherries. The reserve wines, some dating back ten years give the wine lushness. The depth of the thousand-year old chalk quarries where the wine matures offer a touch of praline along with notes of amber and vanilla.

90 Point Party Trio
class3.Description:
Be the life of any party with this perfect 90+ point trio of wines ideal for any gathering. Whether you are throwing your own dinner soiree or need to bring something to spice up a festivity, this trio is for you. This collection includes three of our favorite 90+ point rated party-perfect wines.

Wine Gift Set Includes:

  • Mumm Napa Valley Brut NV
    A complex assemblage of primarily Pinot Noir and Chardonnay, Brut Prestige opens with gorgeous layered white blossom aromas, followed by creamy vanilla, citrus, stone fruit and melon. With elegant acidity and crisp structure, this medium-bodied sparkling wine displays an excellent mousse and a rich, lingering finish. Refreshing acidity and fruit character makes Brut Prestige an excellent food wine.
    Rated 91 Points Wine Spectator
    Rated 91 Points Wilfred Wong of Wine.com

  • Borgo Scopeto 2010 Chianti Classico
    Deep ruby red, with light burgundy reflections, this full and intense wine has notes of small wild berries and pleasing scents of noble wood, vanilla and cocoa. Dry, well structured, austere and elegant, this Chianti strikes a harmonious balance between structure and fruit, and boasts an excellent persistence on the palate.
    Rated 92 Points Wine Spectator

  • Giesen 2014 Sauvignon Blanc

    Pale yellow color with green hues. The aroma is fresh and vibrant with a base of rich tropical fruit but dominated especially when young, by fresh lime and lemongrass aromas as well as a fresh herb note. The palate shows a lovely fruit weight on the mid palate with flavors reminiscent of gooseberry and citrus and this is surrounded by a juicy, pure acidity giving the wine its zesty exuberance with a fresh, dry finish.
    Rated 90 Points Tasting Panel

Due to the popularity of this gift, wines sometimes sell out. Should this happen, we will always substitute with wines of equal or greater value.

class3.Name: XoG Mixed Wine Pack (16/187ml singles)
class3.Description:
Life is always moving, and finally with Xo, G Wine by Giuliana Rancic, there's a wine you can take with you. This delicious wine, wrapped up in 4 beautiful, shatterproof glasses, is perfect for on-the-go, or when just one glass is enough. No corkscrew, no stemware, no worries. Just snap apart the 4 prefilled glasses to share among friends, or simply enjoy one glass at time. Finally, great wine made easy.

This delightful contrast of red and white wine makes the Xo, G Mixed Pack the gift everyone will want. Featuring two glasses of Pinot Noir and two glasses of Pinot Grigio, it's something for everyone, wrapped up in one fabulous bottle. Because life is full of hard decisions - wine shouldn't be one of them.

This 4 bottle pack contains 16 individually sealed and proportioned 187ML wines.

class3.Name: Stack Wine (16/187ML singles) Cabernet Sauvignon
class3.Description:
Stack Wine offers the only snap apart, ready-to-drink, single-serve package of award-winning California wine.

Each shatterproof glass is individually sealed and pre-portioned, eliminating the need for corkscrews and stemware Whether you're headed to the beach or simply relaxing at home, indulging in a delicious glass of wine has never been so easy.

Color:Medium garnet, perfect clarity.
Nose:Medium/plus with cassis, blueberry, cedar and some black licorice, mint and black pepper.
Palate:Blackberry, cocoa and berry jam.

Contains 16 individually sealed and pre-portioned 187ML wines

Riedel Black Tie Bliss Decanter
class3.Description:
Riedel decanters combine sophistication and elegance with optimal shapes for aeration. Decanting old wines, just a few moments before they are served, helps to ensure that the wine's clarity and brilliance are not obscured by any deposit that may have developed over time. Decanting young wines several hours before they are served gives the wine a chance to bloom and attain a stage of development that normally requires years of aging.

A labor of love, the Riedel Black Tie Bliss Decanter displays a rotund foundation with an off-center heart stamped from each side, thus compressing the crystal into a thin pane of solid glass. This innovative design forces the wine to pool around the element while providing a place for the fingers to rest as the wine flows out of the decanter into a waiting glass. The decanter is mouth-blown and formed by hand without the use of molds, making each a unique work of art. The decanter stands 14 3/8" high and holds 1,210ML/42-5/8 oz. Made from 24% lead crystal.

Wine sold separately.

See other Riedel Decanters

Attention California residents. Proposition 65 warning: Consuming foods or beverages that have been kept or served in leaded crystal products or handling products made of leaded crystal will expose you to lead, a chemical known to the State of California to cause birth defects or other reproductive harm.

Promotional code discounts do not apply to this product.

Iron Horse Wedding Cuvee & Godiva Gift Set
class3.Description:
The Iron Horse Wedding Cuvee opens with aromas of raspberry, mandarin orange peel and nutmeg. In the mouth stone fruit, pink grapefruit, Tahitian lime, blood orange, raspberry with a gentle mouthfeel. A food friendly wine that works with most styles, sauces and preparations. This sparkling wine pairs beautifully with the Godiva 19-piece Gold Ballotin of assorted deep dark chocolates, smooth milks, velvety ganaches, classic truffles and pralines. Cheers!

Wine Gift Includes:

class3.Name: Spanish Wine Trio
class3.Description:
Discover Spain's stylish mix of the traditional and modern with three wines that represent the country's diversity: Verdejo from MarquÃ©s de CÃ¡ceres, a modern white wine from Spain's infamous Rioja region, Bodegas Muriel Crianza, a traditional style Rioja, and Campo Viejo Garnacha, an innovative and expressive fruity red wine. For anyone who enjoys the incredible wines of Spain, this trio delivers a diverse and delicious selection.

Wine Gift Includes:
  • MarquÃ©s de CÃ¡ceres Verdejo
    As Spain's signature white grape, the wines produced from Verdejo are refreshing and aromatic. The Verdejo from MarquÃ©s de CÃ¡ceres is a modern style Rioja made using French techniques. Visually, this wine is a vivid straw color. On the nose, a fresh, clean and intense bouquet is enlivened by notes of citrus fruit with a depth of pears and apples. Deliciously fresh and full in the mouth where racy, focused flavors deliver notes of minerals, lemon rind and green apples. A good length and a refreshing finish, make this a beautiful white to enjoy with an aperitif or to accompany a seafood meal.
  • Bodegas Muriel Crianza Rioja
    According to aging regulations, Bodegas Muriel's Crianza Rioja is aged for 12 months in oak barrels and another year in the bottle before release. With the use of American Oak, the nose exhibits very fine mature oak aromas, including vanilla, coconut and balsamic notes, combined with fruit and licorice hints, as well as mature red fruit. The palate is full and elegant, leaving a very pleasant sensation in the finish. This traditional Rioja is the perfect wine for everyday drinking.
  • Campo Viejo Garnacha
    Unusual for such a wine, this Garnacha also has a marked caramel undertone that is more nuanced than the average Rioja. The wine has a red color with purple flashes. It is very bright and lively, with a nose of strawberry, raspberry, cherry, and blackberry backed with notes of violet and lilac. Subtle notes of sweet spices and toast enhance and wrap the fruit. It is soft, silky, fresh and intense.
  • Printed Insert that describes the featured wines

Due to the popularity of this gift, wines sometimes sell out. Should this happen, we will always substitute wines with equal or greater value.

class3.Name: The Seeker Trio
class3.Description:
Seek out your own wine adventure with these delicious wines from The Seeker brand. The Seeker is a global brand that works with family wineries around the world, seeking out top-quality wines from the regions that grow them best. The Seeker crosses time zones and continents in a relentless quest for the world's best wines, bringing the thrill of adventure and discovery with each sip.

Wine Set Includes:
  • The Seeker Sauvignon Blanc (New Zealand)
    Lifted aromas of red currant, passionfruit and spearmint combine for an intense bouquet. The palate has prominent fresh acidity which is balanced by an intense core of fruit where characters of lime and apple come to mind. A seamless and refreshing wine.
  • The Seeker Pinot Noir (France)
    Full of red fruit and spice, this wine showcases Pinot Noir's signature silky texture and food-friendliness. Sweet cherry fruit melds with earth and spice, balanced acidity and ripe, fine tannin, giving a long, smooth finish.
  • The Seeker Malbec (Argentina)
    Aromas of fresh red fruit and spice dominate. On the palate, this wine is smooth and robust, with juicy, ripe black cherry flavors culminating in a lingering, spicy finish.
  • The Seeker Luggage Tag

Due to the popularity of this gift, vintages sometimes sell out. Should this happen, we will always substitute with the current vintage.

Downton Abbey Gift Set
class3.Description:
Whether you love watching the headstrong Mary navigate her estate, or can't wait to catch up on the "downstairs" gossip, this collection will delight any Downton Abbey lover. With wine that even Carson would approve, you'll want to curl up with a glass for the season premiere in January.

Gift includes:

Downton Abbey Blanc
This classic Bordeaux white wine is an elegant, dry version made with grapes sourced from the famed Entre-Deux-Mers ("between two seas") region of Bordeaux, France. A lovely, pale yellow color, the nose delivers classic notes of tangerine, which leads to more citrusy notes and delicious flavors of apricots on a harmonious, crisp palate. Enjoy this wine as delicious accompaniment to goat cheese, fish, shellfish and more, or as a refreshing aperitif all on its own.
Blend: 70% Muscadelle, 30% Semillon Blanc.

Downton Abbey Claret
This classic Bordeaux red blend or "Claret" is an elegant, dry wine made with grapes from the renowned Entre-Deux-Mers region of Bordeaux, France. Deep purple in color, this wine reveals gorgeous scents of wild berries including blackberries, raspberries and black currants in the glass. An excellent food wine, enjoy this Bordeaux Claret with cheese, game, grilled red meats, hearty stews and more.
Blend: 70% Merlot, 25% Cabernet Sauvignon, 5% Malbec

Downton Abbey Candle in French Claret (10oz)
The French Claret candle is a delicious blend of blueberry and concord grapes fused with violet notes. An accent of maple sugar gives off a delightful sensory experience.

Downton Abbey Tea in English Rose (36 tea bags)
This vibrant, ruby-red infusion of rose, raspberry and hibiscus has fruity, floral notes and a touch of sweetness. Inspired by traditional British desserts, this caffeine-free, luscious tea is perfect as an afternoon or late-evening treat. Enjoy hot or cooled over a tall glass of ice. Ingredients: Nigerian hibiscus, rosehip peels, apples, stevia, natural raspberry, natural rose and vanilla flavors and rose petals
